releaseNotes:
Your favorite Truth or Dare app has been completely revamped!
- Brand new design
- Hundreds of new questions
- Perfect for couples and friends
- Faster, better, and more fun than ever
description:
Truth or Dare by Partybus - The Ultimate Party Game!

Ready to laugh, blush and maybe even reveal a secret? Truth or Dare by Partybus is the wildest, funniest and most unforgettable party game - perfect for couples and groups of friends!
 
Board the Party Bus and get ready for a ride full of adventure. Whether you're looking for in-depth questions, wild challenges or just a good time, this is not your average Truth or Dare. Are you brave enough to tell the truth ... or do you opt for the challenge?
 
Play how you like: For couples and friends

Couples Mode
Set the mood and get closer with romantic, cheeky or playful truths and dares for two. Perfect for a date, a cozy night in, or something a bit more exciting...

Friends Mode
The ultimate icebreaker for parties, game nights or road trips! Discover funny secrets, complete wild challenges, and create unforgettable memories. From chill fun to total chaos – you set the vibe.

Two game modes, twice the fun!

Roulette Mode
Add all players, spin the wheel, and let fate decide who’s up next. Perfect for group play and full of surprises!

Card Mode
Take turns drawing a playing card and see what the game has in store:
Truth Cards – Spicy or thought-provoking questions
Dare Cards – Funny, bold, and sometimes cheeky challenges
Truth or Dare Cards – We choose your fate!
Joker Cards – Mysterious cards that keep you guessing
 
Why You'll Love Truth or Dare by Partybus:
Suitable for both couples and groups of friends
Original truths & dares in different themes and moods
From mild to EXTREME - you set the vibe
Great for parties, road trips, date nights & more
Every game is different - no repeats, just endless fun
 
Smile. Connect. Dare to move forward.
Truth or Dare by Partybus is not just a game - it is an unforgettable experience. It's all about fun, connection and pushing boundaries in the best way possible.
 
Download now and let the Party Bus take you on a wild ride full of laughter, honesty and unforgettable moments. Are you ready to play?

This app offers additional features via in-app subscriptions. Subscriptions are available on a weekly, monthly, and yearly basis and are automatically renewed.
 
Privacy policy
